mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list(order_list_num, member_id, order_comment, address, address2, total_price, payment, recipient) VALUES (order_list_num_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{orderComment}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{totalPrice}, #{payment}, #{recipient})
mapper.select: SELECT order_list_num AS "orderListNum", member_id AS "memberId", order_comment AS "orderComment", address, address2, total_price AS "totalPrice", payment, recipient FROM order_list WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND rownum = 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC
